WorkItem.Description:
Environment:
===============
1. VS2005
2. SQL Samples
 
Repro Steps:
===============
1. Unzip 'SQL2008.Data_Access_and_DP.Samples.zip' to <SampleRoot>
2. Local to '<SampleRoot>\Samples\'
 
Expectation:
===============
There should be only Data Access' and DP's Samples in this zip.
 
Actual Result:
===============
There are Analysis Services' Samples.
WorkItem.Summary: Installer: Engine’s installers contain Analysis Services’ Sample

Comments.Message: I can't reproduce this, leilu. I only see the Engine\Data Access\ samples in that zip.

This bug was created on old builds.
We verified it on the latest builds(090206), and it's not repro.
So close it.
